statements: UPDATE engagement_metrics SET likes = 100, shares = 50 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET comments = 20, likes = 150 WHERE post_id = 2;
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET likes = 100, comments = 50, shares = 25 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET likes = 75, shares = 20, comments = 30 WHERE post_id = 2;
UPDATE posts SET likes = 50, shares = 20 WHERE post_id = 101
UPDATE users SET username = 'john_doe' WHERE user_id = 201
UPDATE posts SET likes = 100, shares = shares + 1 WHERE post_id = 12345 AND user_id = 54321;
UPDATE users SET username = 'JohnDoe123' WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET likes = 50, comments = 20 WHERE post_id = 101;
UPDATE social_media_posts SET post_content = 'New Post Content', post_date = '2022-10-15 12:00:00' WHERE post_id = 201;
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET likes = likes + 10, comments = comments + 5 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE social_media_posts SET post_content = 'New Post Content', post_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE post_id = 2;
UPDATE posts SET likes = 100 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE post_comments SET comment_text = 'Great post!' WHERE post_id = 2 AND user_id = 5;
UPDATE posts SET likes = 100, shares = shares + 1 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE post_comments SET comment_text = 'Updated comment text' WHERE comment_id = 3;
UPDATE posts SET likes = likes + 1 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE posts SET likes = likes + 1, comments = comments - 1 WHERE post_id = 1;
UPDATE post_comments SET comment_text = 'Updated comment text', comment_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE comment_id = 3;
